content.label: Great fun game to kill time and rack your brain over.
Really a great game.  Confounding at times but always fascinating. On to the Room III. When will The Room IV come out?

The scenes are awesome the game extremely enjoyable 
I really there will be more soon

This game is incredible! I just did 1 then 2 and can‚Äôt wait to do more. I do use the hints when I‚Äôm stuck but they‚Äôre not full answers so it‚Äôs still a challenge and fun. Great job by developers!

I just finished the first game and this one back to back. Just purchased the other two. I am so genuinely impressed by the puzzles and the atmosphere these games have. Can‚Äôt wait to continue the journey.
The is the kind of game I like, ad free, riddle filled, challenging experience, you should keep up the great work!

I got involved in the Myst series years ago and was looking for something similar in a mobile platform. The graphics are excellent the puzzles challenging but ultimately solvable. It is exactly what I was looking for. I look forward to the next installment in the series.

title.label: Top Visuals, Top Puzzler, Spooky Atmosphere

content.label: Intriguing puzzles. Hard to put down. Worth the cost. Can‚Äôt wait for the next!
This is by far the best game I‚Äôve played! Love everything about it. Challenging, creepy and fun!
Such a great game, no extra words. Please make more thank you
Love The Room series but this is not my favorite of the lot. A little cheesy with a crummy ending and shorter chapters, but still a top-notch game nonetheless.
Love love love the uniqueness of fireproof games.

I'm not a big gamer person but I love puzzles and especially when the graphics are great, I have succeeded with both Room and Room 2 and will recommend it to all me friends, even got my grand-daughter into it.  You guys have done a great job on this and I so look forward to more.
I replayed both The Room and The Room 2 over the last couple days. They‚Äôre both absolutely gems of game making. I look forward to replaying 3 and Old Sins soon!

I LOVE this game! It was challenging, fun, and at times frustrating, but I just want to go back and do it all again. I really enjoyed the puzzles, the graphics, and the mechanics of the game. I‚Äôm a big fan of gears and cogs, and I got plenty in this game. I loved the first game in the series, loved this game even more, and I‚Äôm going to rush to buy the third edition as soon as I‚Äôm done with this review! Spoiler alert: Thank you developers for the WONDERFUL nautical room!! It was awesome!!
Challenging and fun.

title.label: I‚Äôm torn as how to rate this

content.label: This puzzle game is great for those who like a leisurely game. As a general concept, the graphics are excellent, but some scenes are so dark it‚Äôs hard to see if your playing during the day. The challenges within the game are sometimes too easy, and other times way too abstract.
Love the puzzles! Thanks for tips I did get stuck a couple of times. Is there a part 3 I will buy it
I have finished the first two games in two days! I just can‚Äôt stop playing. I love puzzles and this one is unbelievable. I can‚Äôt wait to download the next few!
The only issue with the game is that sometimes the hints were a little vague. Other than that literally no issues. Graphics were amazing, gameplay was amazing, and the storyline is great.
Finished Room One and Room Two.  Now what??  Awesome and challenging and eye candy!!  OH, there‚Äôs Room THREE!!!

Truly difficult without hints. Great puzzles. Honorable mention to the box and ball puzzle in the Seance Room...easy concept, seemingly simple, frustratingly harder than I thought. Great execution throughout the game. And not a single Hidden Object ..ahem...‚ÄúPuzzle‚Äù! Looking forward to downloading next two in the series. Cheers!

The game graphics and puzzles are fun. 

However there doesn't seem to be a point to all of it.  There's just a vague narrative one pieces together from various notes.  

There are a lot of things hinted at but nothing is coherent in terms of a goal, objective, plot, or anything else beyond solving the puzzles.  

Still for the graphics and puzzles it is a lot of fun and entertaining.

The graphics, first of all, are impressive in general- let alone on a phone. I appreciate the work that has been put into these games and agree that they are worth the little but of money. There are multiple levels, each with a different theme that ties into the overall story. The maneuverability is simple and easy to pick up, which makes getting started a breeze. The puzzles are challenging but not impossible and the hints have just enough information without giving too much away and making the game too easy. Some similar games are just so poorly constructed that it isn‚Äôt the puzzle that is hard, but knowing what areas you can actually access by randomly tapping all over the screen and hoping something is selectable. You will not have that issue in The Room, however. If you enjoy mysteries, puzzles, and a little bit of macabre you will enjoy this game. I‚Äôm moving on to the third!
I love this game! I‚Äôve downloaded all of the room games and I can‚Äôt get enough! I hope they keep making more.
Truly an amazing fantastic game , from visuals to feels, to a surprise ending! I hope there‚Äôs a 3rd version coming out ASAP! Worth it.

The puzzles are challenging and most of all fun! Though original, I find its (atmospherically) a lot like one of my all time favourite games Myst.  Better in my opinion.  Few games can really pull you into its reality, this one does. I look forward to The Room 3!

I love this game. I can‚Äôt stop playing. It‚Äôs like mind candy. Please make lots more.
It was scary fun and entertaining

One word, fanfrickintastic! The ONLY change I would suggest is not making the clues available so soon. Whenever you hear that soft, bing, it difficult, or can be, to ignore it and keep trying to figure it out on your own.

This game has the right amount touch.
The look and feel is just right! 
It‚Äôs not a escape the room app its a escape the box app. A box inside a room... a room inside a box. 
Story line is fun & mysterious. 
I don‚Äôt normally pay for apps but this one is worth it. You get what you pay for with this game.... NO AD‚Äôs

To the game makers..... if you keep making it I‚Äôll keep buying it.

title.label: Nowhere near as good as the first game

content.label: Puzzles range from too easy to buggy ridiculous. Still a great series I hope that the third game redeems my hope.
Not gonna lie IT MADE ME THROW MY SELF

These games are fantastic. I also really appreciate that you can start a chapter over.  That helped when chapter 4 had a little glitch. I‚Äôm not sure how it happened but it thought that I had a key that I no longer had. I began the chapter again and everything was fine. Glitches happen, but being able to start that chapter again instead of starting the whole game again was really helpful. Thanks for these great games!!!

title.label: Tarot Cards Ought not Ever to Be messed with

content.label:
I purchased Room II because of the Myst-eques qualities:  the look and feel of the graphics and that one must use their noggin to think through the clues and hidden messages to unlock the puzzles.  But then I came across the room with the tarot cards.  Tarot cards are not ever to be messed with not even in a game.  That is not just my view, but the viewpoint of many who understand the occult.  Sadly, I will not continue the game.  Developers, do you have occult in all the Room games? If what I experienced is a just one-off, great; then I would be interested in the other Room series.  Would you consider refunding my money? 

Thanks you.
Player from Room one and continuing this Room Two. This time I tried not to use hint and every time when I got stuck, I thought for a while and then solved it. Really enjoyed the experience!
Like the first one, I love the games so much that the only drawback is their length.  I want it to be longer!!!

This is the of the best puzzles I have ever played. Came across the quite by accident but I am so happy I did.  There are at least two other games by Fireproof Games and I plan to purchase them as well.

The Room, The Room 2 & 3, and Old Sins are incredibly brilliant in their design, story, puzzles (intricate keys, locks, boxes, etc.) and I can only hope that there‚Äôs more coming in the future. You‚Äôre mastery in game design is superb. No other games, IMO, are comparable. The House of DaVinci 1 & 2 are also good but yours are excellent.
This game is amazing! The graphics are some of the best I‚Äôve seen. Really keeps you enthralled. I recommend this to anyone who likes challenging mystery puzzles!
This game was so much fun! On to the next one!
I really enjoyed the game play but it was really short and did not take that long to complete.
Super fun. Beautiful graphics. Keep them coming!!
I loved The Room. This is even better!
I loved this game! It was definitely worth the purchase. I am headed to buy the next one as soon as I post this review. A job well done to the developers.
Loads of fun and if your a bit lost they help you with hints.
The graphics and effects are of another world. A world of mystery, mind bending puzzles and hours of enjoyment.
I really enjoyed this game.  I thought is was better than the first game.
I can‚Äôt get enough of it I have played the first two . It‚Äôs makes you think and discover ways to do things that are mind bending. Keep them coming
